div.p: We're pleased to announce the 3.0 release of ActiveMQ. Alot of tuning, testing and fixes have been incorporated into this release. A few notable new features are

ul.li: a new 'discovery' transport protocol for a pure client-only peer network - a self discovering cluster which automatically finds the brokers available on the network (as opposed to the 'peer' protocol which is a complete peer based JMS network).
migrated from the org.activemq to org.activemq package name hierarchy
improved support for more JDBC databases for persistence
an optimised wire protocol (which is unfortunately not compatible with 2.x)

div.p: For more details please see the release notes
